title: Healthy Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies
directions: mix dry ingredients together, then stir in pumpkin puree, eggs and optional sweetener
add chocolate chips and pumpkin seeds

best served with some almond or coconut milk as coconut flour cookies tend to be a little more dry and/or cake-like, but very delicious in their own right. The trick for a crispy cookie is to store them in the freezer & eat them right out of the freezer!
ingredients: 1/2 tsp pumpkin spice (or cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, ginger)
40gr/1.5oz organic dark chocolate chips (75% or higher)
